thread.title: World Watch

author: wsjcom
title: World Watch
text:
IRAN Death Toll Increases in Mecca Stampede Iran on Thursday nearly doubled to 464 the number of pilgrims it said died in last week’s hajj stampede in Mecca, state media reported, amid heightened tensions between Tehran and regional rival Saudi Arabia.
Another 241 of the 64,000 Iranians who took part in this year’s pilgrimage were still missing, the official Islamic Republic News Agency reported, citing Iran’s Hajj and Pilgrimage... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
